Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP, 32 or 64 bit
  • Processor: 1 GHz +
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: In game options, Screen Resolution set to 1920x1080! Very important to see the Story comic pages! XBox 360, Logitech F310, and Steam Controllers have limited support. To pause the game press ESC on keyboard.
